title: Calories in Chicken Wing
meta_description: Discover calories in chicken wing, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown per wing, and preparation tweaks for better choices.
assumptions: Medium-sized chicken wing (~30 g) with skin, baked, no sauce or breading.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, cooking method, brand, and additions like sauce; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One baked chicken wing with skin provides ~99 kcal and ~9 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one chicken wing?
faqs.a: About 99 kcal for a baked wing with skin.

faqs.q: What is the protein in a chicken wing?
faqs.a: Roughly 9 g protein per medium baked wing.

faqs.q: Are chicken wings high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, ~7 g total fat per wing, mostly from skin; skinless reduces it.

faqs.q: Calories in fried vs. baked chicken wing?
faqs.a: Fried adds ~50 kcal due to oil absorption.
Negligible carbs (0 g) unless breaded or sauced.
